home.title: Explore the world with Geotagger!
home.description: Geotagger is website that allows you to post picture and tag it on the map. Other user than try to locate it via Google Maps.
home.info: Try to guess the location of image by selecting position on the map. When you guess it, it gives you the error distance.

signUp.title: Sign up
signUp.description: Your name will appear on posts and your public profile.
